Package com.atakmap.android.maps

Interface ILocation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttachmentContent, FalconViewContentHandler, FeatureDbContentHandler, FeatureHierarchyListItem, FileOverlayContentHandler, GalleryFileItem, GeoJSONContentHandler, GeoPackageContentHandler, GMLContentHandler, GpxContentHandler, GRGContentHandler, KmlContentHandler, KMZContentHandler, LayerContentHandler, MapItemHierarchyListItem, ModelContentHandler, MvtContentHandler, NonExportableMapItemHierarchyListItem, ShapefileContentHandler, SpatialDbContentHandler
    public interface ILocation
    Interface for an item that has a defined location and boundaries

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      GeoBounds getBounds​(MutableGeoBounds bounds)
      Get the geo bounds of this item For points this is usually a bounds representation of the point
      GeoPoint getPoint​(GeoPoint point)
      Get the geo point of this item For shapes this is usually the center point.

    • Method Detail

      • getPoint

        GeoPoint getPoint​(GeoPoint point)
        Get the geo point of this item For shapes this is usually the center point. Please note, this call does not retrieve the metadata for a specific item, just the basic GeoPoint.
        Parameters:
        point - Mutable point (null to create new point)
        Returns:
        Geo point or null if N/A. This lacks the associated metadata.

      • getBounds

        GeoBounds getBounds​(MutableGeoBounds bounds)
        Get the geo bounds of this item For points this is usually a bounds representation of the point
        Parameters:
        bounds - Mutable bounds (null to create new bounds)
        Returns:
        Geo bounds or null if N/A
